::Smokescreen/Firearm::

Smokescreen nods. "Its possible. The trainers hit you with a mind-
controll chip. You have been serving them for a little while. Ramulus 
made a counter chip, and shot it into you. It should have fried the 
Trainer one, but it might not have. They're all still at the battle."

He looks her over, "We're going to have to get that chip out of you. 
Do you mind coming with me to the Cybertronian Fire?"

Smokescreen turns his head, the sound of footsteps announcing 
Firearm's arrival a few seconds before the Maximal walks in. Firearm 
walks over to the CR chamber and puts BlueStreak in.

"The Trainers left," Firearm says to Smokescreen, glancing at Spears, 
"Striker looks like he's been reprogrammed. He nearly killed Ramulus, 
hit BlueStreak pretty hard, and killed a Maximal femm. The weapon 
Ramulus got us didn't do anything against him, so he isn't chipped. 
He left with the Trainers, so we didn't get him."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> She looked at Smokescreen,"yeah, I think so. what happened? last 
> thing I remember was fighing with Striker and the others against 
some 
> jerks who called thenselves the Trainers. Did I get hit or 
something? 
> I don't remember getting hit?" She put her hands on her head as she 
> felt a little power surge, but it quickly faded.
> "Yeah, I'll be fine."
> She slowly stepped out of the CR chamber.  She noticed he had his 
> hand on his gun."What? You think I'm going to attack or something?"
